00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Parameters
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : David S. Whyte [david(at)ihpc.a-star.edu.sg]
00005 !              Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00006 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00037 
00038  SUBROUTINE Parameters
00039 
00040 ! Common variables
00041  USE Domain
00042  USE FluidParams
00043  USE LBMParams
00044  USE MPIParams, ONLY : master, mpi_xdim, mpi_ydim, mpi_zdim, proc
00045  USE MPI
00046  IMPLICIT NONE
00047 
00048 ! Local variables
00049  INTEGER :: i, j, k, xb, yb, zb, Rb, DISTRO
00050  INTEGER :: IO_ERR, MPI_ERR
00051  INTEGER, DIMENSION (1:15) :: intParam
00052  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: dx, dy, dz, xdmax, ydmax, zdmax, x, y, z, Lx, Ly, Lz
00053  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION (1:9) :: dblParam
00054  REAL(KIND = DBL), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: bubblesVec
00055 
00056 
00057 ! Read parameter data from file in master node
00058  IF (proc == master) THEN
00059    OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "properties.in", STATUS = "OLD", ACTION = "READ", &
00060         IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00061    IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00062      READ(10,*)
00063      READ(10,*) Maxstep, RelaxStep
00064      READ(10,*)
00065      READ(10,*) tStat, tDump, xjump
00066      READ(10,*)
00067      READ(10,*) xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, zmin, zmax
00068      READ(10,*)
00069      READ(10,*) rhoL, rhoH
00070      READ(10,*)
00071      READ(10,*) tauRho, tauPhi
00072      READ(10,*)
00073      READ(10,*) IntWidth, sigma, Gamma
00074      READ(10,*)
00075      READ(10,*) Eo, pConv
00076      READ(10,*)
00077      READ(10,*) mpi_xdim, mpi_ydim, mpi_zdim
00078      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00079    ELSE
00080      CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00081      STOP "Error: Unable to open input file 'properties.in'."
00082    END IF
00083 
00084    intParam(1)  = MaxStep
00085    intParam(2)  = RelaxStep
00086    intParam(3)  = tStat
00087    intParam(4)  = tDump
00088    intParam(5)  = xjump
00089    intParam(6)  = xmin
00090    intParam(7)  = xmax
00091    intParam(8)  = ymin
00092    intParam(9)  = ymax
00093    intParam(10) = zmin
00094    intParam(11) = zmax
00095    intParam(12) = mpi_xdim
00096    intParam(13) = mpi_ydim
00097    intParam(14) = mpi_zdim
00098 
00099    dblParam(1) = rhoL
00100    dblParam(2) = rhoH
00101    dblParam(3) = tauRho
00102    dblParam(4) = tauPhi
00103    dblParam(5) = Gamma
00104    dblParam(6) = IntWidth
00105    dblParam(7) = sigma
00106    dblParam(8) = Eo
00107    dblParam(9) = pConv
00108 
00109 ! Read bubble positions
00110    OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "discrete.in", STATUS = "OLD", ACTION = "READ", &
00111       IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00112    IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00113      READ(10,*)
00114      READ(10,*) DISTRO
00115      IF(DISTRO == 1) THEN
00116        READ(10,*)
00117        READ(10,*) xb, yb, zb, Rb
00118        CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00119        nBubbles = xb*yb*zb
00120        Lx = DBLE(xmax)/DBLE(xb)
00121        Ly = DBLE(ymax)/DBLE(yb)
00122        Lz = DBLE(zmax)/DBLE(zb)
00123        xdmax = 0.5D0*Lx - DBLE(Rb)
00124        ydmax = 0.5D0*Ly - DBLE(Rb)
00125        zdmax = 0.5D0*Lz - DBLE(Rb)
00126        CALL RANDOM_SEED
00127        ALLOCATE( bubbles(1:nBubbles,1:4) )
00128        ALLOCATE( bubblesVec(1:nBubbles*4) )
00129        OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "discrete.out", STATUS = "NEW", IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00130        IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00131          WRITE(10,*)'Lx = ',Lx,' Ly = ',Ly,' Lz = ',Lz
00132          DO i = 1, xb
00133            DO j = 1, yb
00134              DO k = 1, zb
00135                CALL RANDOM_NUMBER(dx)
00136                CALL RANDOM_NUMBER(dy)
00137                CALL RANDOM_NUMBER(dz)
00138                x = (i - 0.5D0)*Lx + xdmax*(1.0D0 - 2.0D0*dx)
00139                y = (j - 0.5D0)*Ly + ydmax*(1.0D0 - 2.0D0*dy)
00140                z = (k - 0.5D0)*Lz + zdmax*(1.0D0 - 2.0D0*dz)
00141                bubblesVec(i)              = x
00142                bubblesVec(i + nBubbles)   = y
00143                bubblesVec(i + 2*nBubbles) = z
00144                bubblesVec(i + 3*nBubbles) = Rb
00145                WRITE(10,*)dx, dy, dz, x, y, z, Rb
00146              END DO
00147            END DO
00148          END DO
00149          CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00150        ELSE
00151          CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00152          STOP "Error: Unable to open output file 'discrete.out'."
00153        END IF
00154      ELSE
00155        READ(10,*)
00156        READ(10,*) nBubbles
00157        READ(10,*)
00158        ALLOCATE( bubbles(1:nBubbles,1:4) )
00159        ALLOCATE( bubblesVec(1:nBubbles*4) )
00160        DO i = 1, nBubbles
00161          READ(10,*) bubblesVec(i), bubblesVec(i+nBubbles), bubblesVec(i+2*nBubbles), bubblesVec(i+3*nBubbles)
00162        END DO
00163      END IF
00164    CLOSE(UNIT=10)
00165    ELSE
00166      CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00167      STOP "Error: Unable to open input file 'discrete.in'."
00168    END IF
00169    intParam(15) = nBubbles
00170  END IF
00171 
00172 ! Broadcast values of parameters from the master to all other processors
00173  CALL MPI_BCAST(intParam, 15, MPI_INTEGER, master, MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_ERR)
00174  CALL MPI_BCAST(dblParam,  9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, master, MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_ERR)
00175 
00176 ! Assign parameter data to local-named variables in slave nodes
00177  IF (proc /= master) THEN
00178    MaxStep   = intParam(1)
00179    RelaxStep = intParam(2)
00180    tStat     = intParam(3)
00181    tDump     = intParam(4)
00182    xjump     = intParam(5)
00183    xmin      = intParam(6)
00184    xmax      = intParam(7)
00185    ymin      = intParam(8)
00186    ymax      = intParam(9)
00187    zmin      = intParam(10)
00188    zmax      = intParam(11)
00189    mpi_xdim  = intParam(12)
00190    mpi_ydim  = intParam(13)
00191    mpi_zdim  = intParam(14)
00192    nBubbles  = intParam(15)
00193 
00194    rhoL     = dblParam(1)
00195    rhoH     = dblParam(2)
00196    taurho   = dblParam(3)
00197    tauphi   = dblParam(4)
00198    Gamma    = dblParam(5)
00199    IntWidth = dblParam(6)
00200    sigma    = dblParam(7)
00201    Eo       = dblParam(8)
00202    pConv    = dblParam(9)
00203 
00204    ALLOCATE( bubbles(1:nBubbles,1:4) )
00205    ALLOCATE( bubblesVec(1:nBubbles*4) )
00206  END IF
00207 
00208 ! Broadcast bubble(s) information from master to all other processors
00209  CALL MPI_BCAST(bubblesVec, nBubbles*4, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, master, MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_ERR)
00210 
00211 ! Save in local array bubbles(xc,yc,zc,Rc)
00212  DO i = 1, nBubbles
00213    bubbles(i,1) = bubblesVec(i)              ! xc(i)
00214    bubbles(i,2) = bubblesVec(i + nBubbles)   ! yc(i)
00215    bubbles(i,3) = bubblesVec(i + 2*nBubbles) ! zc(i)
00216    bubbles(i,4) = bubblesVec(i + 3*nBubbles) ! Rc(i)
00217  END DO
00218  DEALLOCATE( bubblesVec )
00219 
00220 ! Fluid properties
00221  phiStar       = 0.5D0*(rhoH - rhoL)
00222  phiStar2      = phiStar*phiStar
00223  invTauRho     = 1.D0/tauRho
00224  invTauRhoOne  = 1.D0 - invTauRho
00225  invTauRhoHalf = 1.D0 - 0.5D0*invTauRho
00226 
00227  eta        = 1.D0/(tauPhi + 0.5D0)
00228  eta2       = 1.D0 - eta
00229  invEta2    = 0.5D0/eta
00230  invTauPhi  = 1.D0/tauPhi
00231  invTauPhi1 = 1.D0 - invTauPhi
00232 
00233 ! Chemical Potential Stuff
00234  alpha  = 0.75D0*sigma/(IntWidth*phistar**4.D0)
00235  alpha4 = alpha*4.D0
00236  kappa  = (IntWidth*phistar)**2.D0*alpha/2.D0
00237 
00238 ! Rc = bubbles(1,4) Use the first bubble as the largest in the system
00239  gravity = 0.25D0*Eo*sigma/( (rhoH - rhoL)*bubbles(1,4)*bubbles(1,4) )
00240  grav = 2.D0*phiStar*gravity
00241 
00242 ! Modified LBM parameters
00243  Eg0n  = invTauRho*Eg0
00244  Eg1n  = invTauRho*Eg1
00245  Eg2n  = invTauRho*Eg2
00246 
00247  EgC0n = invTauRhoHalf*Eg0C
00248  EgC1n = invTauRhoHalf*Eg1C
00249  EgC2n = invTauRhoHalf*Eg2C
00250 
00251 ! Middle planes (x = xo), (y = yo), (z = zo)
00252  xo = INT(0.5D0*(xmax + xmin))
00253  yo = INT(0.5D0*(ymax + ymin))
00254  zo = INT(0.5D0*(zmax + zmin))
00255 
00256  RETURN
00257  END SUBROUTINE Parameters
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:46 2008 for ZSC-3D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
